name: Codup WooCommerce Dynamic Pricing Table View
author: Codup.io

sections.description:
This plugin enables you to show your woocommerce product’s discount in an elegant way.

FEATURES:

Discount Pricing Table
Currently shows discount pricing table with limited support.

Admin Settings
Show Pricing Table: Shows/Hides Discount Pricing Table.
Pricing Table Location: Choose between two locations(Add To Cart Button, In A Tab) where you want to display Discount Pricing Table.
Quantity Label: If it is set, the label shows on table instead of default label “Quantity”.
Discount type Label: If it is set, the label shows on table instead of default label “Discount”.
Price Discount Location: If information is entered on the text field, it will show with every Price Discount rule on the pricing table as a prefix or suffix depend on choice.
Fixed Price Location: Same Setting as “Price Discount Location”
Percentage Discount Location: Same Setting as “Price Discount Location”
*If date of pricing rule is expired, It will show status on pricing table and also notify admin on Dynamic Pricing tab besides date field.

Prerequisite
1. WooCommerce
2. WooCommerce Dynamic Pricing

Installation/Configuration

  1. Install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
  3. Use the Dashboard->Products.
  4. Make product
  5. Choose Pricing Table from product data screen to configure plugin.
  6. It works when you select following values for pricing group in Dynamic pricing tab.
    Applies To : Everyone/ Specific Roles
    Quantities based on : Product Quantity
    Rule Processing mode : Bulk
    Dates : Either “date from” or “date to” or both or none.
    Type : Price Discount

short_description: This plugin extends WooCommerce Dynamic Pricing to display bulk pricing tables on WooCommerce product pages.
